channel.title: How to attack NPC and add shops in 508 server
channel.description:
okay so How do I get so I can kill king black dragon? As In this I see the option to attack it but when I click it doesn't do anything. The server is palidino76 one.
Thanks for any help.

item.title: How to attack NPC and add shops in 508 server
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“i0wnuall, post:3, topic:256761”][quote author=r r r link=topic=339110.msg2630118#msg2630118 date=1232103733]
okay so How do I get so I can kill king black dragon? As In this I see the option to attack it but when I click it doesn’t do anything. The server is palidino76 one.

Thanks for any help.
[/quote]

For the Attack Npc, make sure you did the Tutorial…I can’t remember if it was on here or the other site i use.
If you cannot find it on here use google.com type in Rune Server. That’s where a lot of 508 stuff is located :)[/quote]
the tut is by stricken, but i coded own way for attacking npc, it has all right wep anim, npc fades when dead(need to work more on deathemotes), and unfortunetly npc’s dont attack back, i got a long way to go.

Read full topic
item.source: How to attack NPC and add shops in 508 server
